dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator that allows for the generation of synthetic datasets for evaluating the adversarial robustness of neural models against physical adversarial patches.
dcterms:title: CARLA Simulator

dcterms:description: A dataset of physical adversarial attacks on object detection, specifically designed to evaluate the effectiveness of adversarial patches in real-world scenarios.
dcterms:title: APRICOT

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire

dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a large-scale dataset that contains images of common objects in context, providing annotations for object detection, segmentation, and captioning.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides a benchmark suite for various tasks in autonomous driving, including stereo vision, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI
